abstract: marvin compper set for celtic medical as german edges closer to switch .
article: the rb leipzig defender will reportedly put the finishing touches on his move before joining the hoops in january . marvin compper is set to undergo his celtic medical as he closes in on a Â£ 1million switch to the premiership champions . the rb leipzig defender will put the final touches on his move in the next 48 hours before joining the hoops in january , according to german outlet sportbuzzer . the 32-year-old has been earmarked as the man to help steady the ship at the back for brendan rodgers ' side . celtic suffered a 4-0 defeat against hearts on sunday and conceded 18 goals in their champions league group .
